description:
Understanding what makes people pay attention is the key to communicating. Whether you're pitching or speaking at events, or giving presentations at work, knowing what you need to say and how you need to say it are critical. If you want to have your audiences remember your pitch and take your advice you need to understand how influence and persuasion work.

This Effective Communication Skills Training course is designed to teach you easy ways to persuade better and have long lasting influence. This short video based effective communication skills training will give you information and the interactive activities will lock them in your brain so you can use them any time! This isn't just a recording of me speaking to a group, it's an online course designed specifically for the Udemy platform.

Learn to influence people without being manipulative or "salesy". Get others to see you point of view and listen to you so they will follow you lead... at work and at home.

So don't wait! Sign up for Effective Communication Skills Training course NOW and start on the path to more influence and be a successful super hero!

</p>
title: Using Influence and Persuasion for Effective Leadership
